name: end
label::English: end

name: today
label::English: today

name: deviceid
label::English: deviceid

name: SecAMetadata
label::English: A. Metadata

name: A1_Metadata
label::English: A.1: Household displacement status

name: A2_Metadata
label::English: A.2: Select Governorate

name: A3_Metadata
label::English: A.2: Select District

name: A4_Metadata
label::English: A.2: Select Sub-Area

name: A5_Metadata
label::English: A.2: Select Location

name: A6_Metadata
label::English: A.4: Enumerator's code

name: A7_Metadata
label::English: A.5: Date of survey
constraint_message: Date of survey must be equal to or greater than 1-6-2019

name: A8a_Metadata
label::English: A.6a: Time of survey (Start)

name: A8b_Metadata
label::English: A.6b: Time of survey (Finish)

name: A9_Metadata
label::English: A.7: How was the data collected?

name: SecBDemographics
label::English: B. Demographics

name: B1_Demographics
label::English: B.1: Are you the head of the household?

name: B2_Demographics
label::English: B.2: What is your nationality?

name: B2o_Demographics
label::English: B.2.1: What is other nationality?

name: B3y_Demographics
label::English: B.3: Which year were you born?
constraint_message: Year should be between 1900 and 2001

name: B3m_Demographics
label::English: B.3: Which month were you born?
constraint_message: Month should be from 1 to 12

name: B3_Age
label::English: B.3: How old are you?

name: B3c_Demographics_AgeCal
label::English: Calculate Age

name: B4_Demographics
label::English: B.4: What is your marital status?

name: B5_Demographics
label::English: B.5: How many members are there in your household (including you)?

name: B6_Demographics
label::English: B.6: Is your household hosting others (relatives and friends) not part of the immediate family, i.e. not blood relatives?

name: B7_RecordHHMembers
label::English: B.7.1: For each individual in your household including you, please record the following information:

name: B7HHMembers
label::English: B.7.1. Record Household Memebers

name: B7HHMembersInfo
label::English: Member Information 1

name: B711_Name
label::English: Name/nickname

name: B712_Gender
label::English: Gender

name: B713_YearBorn
label::English: Year of birth
constraint_message: Year should be between 1900 and 2001

name: B714_MonthBorn
label::English: Month of birth
constraint_message: Month should be from 1 to 12

name: B715_Age
label::English: Age (if year unknown)

name: B716_AgeCalc
label::English: Calculate Age

name: B717_Relationship
label::English: Relationship to the head of household

name: B718_Relationship_other
label::English: B.71: Other?

name: B719_MaritalStatus
label::English: Marital status

name: B7HHMemberPrag
label::English: Member Information 2

name: B720_Pregnent
label::English: Pregnant and/or lactating

name: B721_SchoolEnrolment
label::English: School enrolment in 2018-2019

name: B722_HighestEducation
label::English: Highest level of education

name: B723_CurrentIncome
label::English: Currently earning income

name: B724_SectorEmployment
label::English: Sector of employment

name: B725_NonCommunicableDisease
label::English: Non-communicable disease

name: B726_PsychologicalAddress
label::English: Symptoms of psychological distress (nightmares, flashbacks, etc.)

name: B72_DifficultyNote
label::English: B.7.2: For each member of the household, ask about difficulties they may have faced  because of the following:

name: B72_Vision
label::English: VISION ? does any members of your household have difficulty seeing, even when wearing glasses?

name: B72_Hearing
label::English: HEARING ? does any members of your household have difficulty hearing, even when using a hearing aid?

name: B72_Mobility
label::English: MOBILITY ? does any members of your household have difficulty walking or climbing steps?

name: B72_Communication
label::English: COMMUNICATION ? Using your usual language (mother tongue) does any members of your household have difficulty communicating, understanding or being understood?

name: B72_Cognition
label::English: COGNITION ? Do you have difficulty remembering or concentrating?

name: B72_SelfCare
label::English: SELF CARE ? Do you have difficulty with self-care, such as washing or dressing?

name: B72_DirectlyInterviewed
label::English: Directly interviewed

name: B7_RepeatNumber
label::English: RepeatNumber

name: B7_HHMembersCount
label::English: Total members living with HH

name: B7_HHMembersNote
label::English: Total number of household members mentioned in B_5 (${B5_Demographics}) doesn't match with the members entered in B.7.1. 'Record Household Memebers' (${B7_HHMembersCount})
constraint: ${B7_HHMembersCount} = ${B5_Demographics}

name: SecBDemographicsMem
label::English: B. Demographics - HH Members

name: B8_DemographicsMem
label::English: B.8: Are all members of this household who are usually present currently living together?

name: B9_DemographicsMem
label::English: B.9: How many members of the household who are usually present are currently not living here?
constraint_message: HH Members who are usually present are currently not living here should be greater than 0

name: B10HHMembersNotLiving
label::English: B.10. Household Members Not Living With HH

name: B10_DemographicsMem
label::English: B.10: For each individual not living in your household, please record the following information:

name: B10_Name
label::English: Name

name: B10_Gender
label::English: Gender

name: B10_YearBorn
label::English: Year of birth
constraint_message: Year should be between 1900 and 2019

name: B10_MonthBorn
label::English: Month of birth
constraint_message: Month should be from 1 to 12

name: B10_AgeCalc
label::English: Calculate Age

name: B10_Relationship
label::English: Relationship to the head of household

name: B10_LeavingDate
label::English: Date of leaving

name: B10_NotLivingReason
label::English: Reasons for not living there

name: B10_NotLivingReason_other
label::English: Other Reasons for not living there

name: B10_RepeatNumber
label::English: RepeatNumber

name: B10_HHMembersCount
label::English: Total members not living with HH

name: SecCDisplacementDynamics
label::English: C. Displacement Dynamics

name: C1_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.1: Since 2015, how many times has your household been forcibly displaced within Yemen*?

name: C2n_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.2:  What do you consider to be your household?s location of origin (your place of residence before displacement)? (please specify governorate, district and location)

name: C2a_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.2: For IDPs only: Select the governorate of place of residence before displacement.

name: C2b_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.2:  Select the district of place of residence before displacement.

name: C2c_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.2: Select the sub-area of place of residence before displacement.

name: C2d_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.2:  Select the location of residence before displacement.
constraint: . != ${A5_Metadata}
constraint_message: Displaced location (A5) and place of origin cannot be same

name: C3_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.3:  What was your point of entry into Yemen?

name: C3o_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.3:  Enter other point of entry.

name: C4_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.4:  How many times have you changed location since your departure from your country of origin till your arrival in Yemen?

name: C5_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.5:  How many months has it been since your household left its location of origin (in the case of IDPs) or country of origin (in the case of refugees and migrants)?

name: C6_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.6: For IDPs, refugees, and migrants: Why did your household leave from where you were before (in the case of Yemenis) or your country of origin (in the case of refugees and migrants)?
constraint: not((selected(., 'c6_12') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'c6_13') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other option and the maximum options that can be selected are 3

name: C7_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.7:  Have any members of your household faced any of the following security incidents based on their legal status/lack of documentation

name: C8_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.8: Why did your household come to this location specifically (pull factors)?
constraint: not((selected(., 'c8_8') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'c8_9') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other option and the maximum options that can be selected are 3

name: C9_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.9: What is the short-term (less than one year) movement intention of your household?

name: C10_DisplacementStatus
label::English: C.10: What is the long-term (more than one year) movement intention of your household?

name: SecDPriorityNeeds
label::English: D. Priority Needs

name: D1_PriorityNeeds
label::English: D.1: What are the top three immediate priority needs of the household?

name: D1a_PriorityNeeds
label::English: D.1a: What is the first priority needs of the household?

name: D1b_PriorityNeeds
label::English: D.1b: What is the second priority needs of the household?
constraint: ${D1a_PriorityNeeds} != ${D1b_PriorityNeeds}
constraint_message: Second need must be different than the first one

name: D1c_PriorityNeeds
label::English: D.1c: What is the third priority needs of the household?
constraint: ${D1a_PriorityNeeds} != ${D1c_PriorityNeeds} and ${D1c_PriorityNeeds} != ${D1b_PriorityNeeds}
constraint_message: Third need must be different than the first and second

name: D2_PriorityNeeds
label::English: D.2: Which of these statements apply to the household?

name: SecEShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E. Shelter/NFI/CCCM

name: E1a_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.1a: OBSERVATION: Is the household living in an IDP hosting site?

name: E1b_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.1b: OBSERVATION: What type of shelter does this household live in?

name: E1c_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.1c: OBSERVATION: What is the status of the shelter?

name: E1d_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.1d: OBSERVATION: What is the state of the shelter?

name: E2_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.2: Does your household pay for your shelter?

name: E3_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.3: Has your household experienced any difficulties paying rent in the last 90 days?

name: E4_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.4: Does your household have access to the following facilities?

name: E5_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.5: Does your shelter or household have any of the following damage?
constraint: not((selected(., 'e5_3') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 1
constraint_message: "No, there is no damage to our shelter/household" can not be selected with other options

name: E6_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.6: If your shelter/household is damaged, are you able to repair the damage?

name: E7_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.7:Does your household face any of the following housing, land and property concerns?
constraint: not((selected(., 'e7_10') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'e7_11') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'e7_12') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: E8_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.8: Are basic non-food items available and affordable for your household to access in the local market?

name: E9_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.9:Is your household involved in community decision making processes?

name: E10_ShelterNFICCCM
label::English: E.10:Have any members of your household benefitted from any of the following durable solutions in the past 90 days?

name: SecFWASH
label::English: F. WASH

name: F1_WASH
label::English: F.1: Can you please show me the household?s toilet, soap and handwashing facility, and water containers used for storage and collection?
constraint: not((selected(., 'f1_4') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: "No" can not be selected with other options

name: F2a_WASH
label::English: F.2a: OBSERVATION: Does the household have soap and water at the handwashing facility?

name: F2b_WASH
label::English: F.2b: OBSERVATION: What type of toilet does the household have?

name: F2c_WASH
label::English: F.2c: OBSERVATION: What is the status of the household toilet?

name: F2d_WASH
label::English: F.2d: OBSERVATION: What is the status of the household?s water containers for storage and collection?

name: F3_WASH
label::English: F.3: What was the main source of water for your household in the last 30 days?

name: F4_WASH
label::English: F.4: Does your household use any methods to treat drinking water for better quality?
constraint: not((selected(., 'f4_4') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'f4_5') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'f4_6') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) >= 1
constraint_message: ?Yes? and ?No? options together cannot be selected

name: F5_WASH
label::English: F.5: How many water container does the household consume each day?
constraint: if(selected(${F1_WASH}, 'f1_3') and .>0, 1, if(not(selected(${F1_WASH}, 'f1_3')), 1,0))
constraint_message: Cannot be 0 if "Containers used for storage and collection" in F_1 is selected

name: F6_WASH
label::English: F.6: How long does it take to go on foot to your main water point, fetch water, and return (at peak time)?

name: F7_WASH
label::English: F.7: How much has the household spent to purchase water in the past 30 days?
hint::English: (1)enter amount-YER (2)Input 9999 if don't know and 8888 if don?t want to anser

name: F8_WASH
label::English: F.8: Were there any hygiene/sanitation items your household needed in the last 30 days but could not access or afford?
constraint: not((selected(., 'f8_11') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) >= 1
constraint_message: "None" can not be selected with other options

name: F9_WASH
label::English: F.9: Has your household had access to a functioning toilet for the last 30 days?

name: F10_WASH
label::English: F.10:What are the main problems they face?

name: F11_WASH
label::English: F.11: When/for what activities does members of your household wash their hands?
constraint: not((selected(., 'f11_9') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) >= 1
constraint_message: "We never wash our hands" can not be selected with other options

name: F12_WASH
label::English: F.12: What is the most common way your household disposed of garbage in the last 30 days?

name: F13_WASH
label::English: F.13: How frequently was garbage collected in the last 30 days?

name: F14_WASH
label::English: F.14: Has your household witnessed visible wastewater in the vicinity (30 meters) of your shelter in the last 30 days?

name: F15_WASH
label::English: F.15: What is the likely occurrence of flooding in the community?

name: SecGEducation
label::English: G. Education

name: G1_Education
label::English: G.1: Have any school-aged children in your household faced any barriers affecting attendance in formal education during the 2018/2019 school year?

name: G2_Education
label::English: G.2: What are the main household barriers school-aged children in your household faced that affected attendance in formal education during the 2018/2019 school year?
constraint: not((selected(., 'g2_12') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'g2_13') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 5
constraint_message: (1)The choice Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options.(2) you can only select 5 options at the maximum

name: G3_Education
label::English: G.3: What are the main external barriers school-aged children in your household faced that affected attendance in formal education during the 2018/2019 school year?
constraint: not((selected(., 'g3_15') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'g3_16') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 5
constraint_message: (1)The choice Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options.(2) you can only select 5 options at the maximum

name: G4_Education
label::English: G.4: What are the main factors that would improve the quality of or access to formal education for school-age children in your household?
constraint: not((selected(., 'g4_17') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'g4_18') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 5
constraint_message: (1)The choice Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options.(2) you can only select 5 options at the maximum

name: G5_Education
label::English: G.5: Are the school-age children in your household attending the correct grade for their age during the 2018/2019 school year?
constraint: not((selected(., 'g5_4') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'g5_5') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'g5_6') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: The choice No, none of them or Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: G6_Education
label::English: G.6: Overall, how satisfied is your household with the quality of the education services received by school-aged children during the 2018/2019 school year?

name: G7_Education
label::English: G.7: If not satisfied or partially satisfied, why is the household not fully satisfied with the education services?
constraint: not((selected(., 'g7_6') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'g7_7') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: The choice Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: SecHHealth
label::English: H. Health

name: H1_Health
label::English: H.1: Has any member of your household experienced any illness in the last 60 days?

name: H2_Health
label::English: H.2: If yes, what illness and/or medical conditions have any household members experienced in the last 60 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h2_23') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h2_24') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: The choice Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: H3_Health
label::English: H.3: Did any household members seek any form of medical treatment in the last 60 days?

name: H4_Health
label::English: H.4: What type of health facilities have members of your household accessed in the past 60 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h4_9') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h4_10') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: The choice Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: H5_Health
label::English: H.5: What types of health services did your household access in the past 60 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h5_6_14') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h5_6_15') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h5_6_16') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: H6_Health
label::English: H.6: What types of health services were not available or accessible to members of your household in the past 60 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h5_6_14') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h5_6_15') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h5_6_16') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: H7_Health
label::English: H.7: If public health facilities were accessed, did household members pay to access health services at public health facility?

name: H8_Health
label::English: H.8: If yes, how much was paid?
relevant: not(selected(${H1_Health}, 'h1_2')) and not(selected(${H3_Health}, 'h3_2')) and not(selected(${H5_Health}, 'h5_14')) and selected(${H7_Health}, 'h7_1')

name: H9_Health
label::English: H.9: If public health facilities were not accessed, did any members of your household face any problems associated with access?

name: H10_Health
label::English: H.10: If yes What are the most serious problems that members of your household face associated with access to public health facilities and/or services in the last 60 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h10_16') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h10_17') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h10_18') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: H11_Health
label::English: H.11: How many minutes does it take for members of your household to reach a functional health facility (on average) in the past 60 days?

name: H12_Health
label::English: H.12: What coping strategies has your household relied on if health services were not available or accessible, in the last 60 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h12_10') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h12_11') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h12_12') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: H13_Health
label::English: H.13: Do you think the health assistance available to your household in the public health facility is meeting your household?s needs?

name: H14_Health
label::English: H.14: Only if members of household have a disability: What specialised services did your household have access to in order to meet the needs of the household members with disabilities?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h14_4') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h14_5') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: H15_Health
label::English: H.15: Have any women in the household given birth in the past 90 days?

name: H16_Health
label::English: H.16: Where were the babies delivered?

name: H17_Health
label::English: H.17: If health facility, how much was paid for care during delivery?
hint::English: (1)enter amount-YER (2)Input 9999 if don't know and 8888 if don?t want to anser

name: H18_Health
label::English: H.18: To be asked to a female: Have any women or girls in your household faced any of the following issues accessing health services/facilities in the past 90 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'h18_15') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'h18_16') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: The choice Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: SecIProtection
label::English: I. Protection

name: I1_Protection
label::English: I.1: Have any members of your household survived any abuse?

name: I2_Protection
label::English: I.2: If yes, what type of abuse?
constraint: not((selected(., 'i2_4') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i2_5') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: I3_Protection
label::English: I.3: Who and/or where did members of your household go to for support?
constraint: not((selected(., 'i3_9') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i3_10') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i3_11') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: I4_Protection
label::English: I.4: What services were available in the community?
constraint: not((selected(., 'i4_6') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i4_7') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i4_8') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: I5_Protection
label::English: I.5: What services were safely accessible in the community?
constraint: not((selected(., 'i5_6') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i5_7') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i5_8') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum (3)

name: I6_Protection
label::English: I.6:  Separated Children, Households with separated children: What services to support the separated children in your household were available and safely accessible in the community?
relevant: selected(${I1_Protection}, 'i1_1') and selected(${A1_Metadata}, 'a1_3') or selected(${A1_Metadata}, 'a1_2') or selected(${A1_Metadata}, 'a1_4')
constraint: not((selected(., 'i6_5') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i6_6') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i6_7') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: I7_Protection
label::English: I.7: single mothers, single/separated women, widows, and elderly women, Households with single mothers, single/separated women, widows, and elderly women: What services, specifically for women, were available and safely accessible in the community?
relevant: selected(${I1_Protection}, 'i1_1') and selected(${A1_Metadata}, 'a1_3') or selected(${A1_Metadata}, 'a1_2') or selected(${A1_Metadata}, 'a1_4')
constraint: not((selected(., 'i7_2') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i7_3') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'i7_4') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)None, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: SecJLivelihood
label::English: J. Livelihood

name: J1_Livelihood
label::English: J.1: In the past 30 days, what were the main sources of income of your household?
constraint: not((selected(., 'j1_13') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'j1_14') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'j1_15') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)No source of income, dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: J2_Livelihood
label::English: J.2: Have you or anyone else in your household faced difficulties in finding employment in the past 90 days?

name: J3_Livelihood
label::English: J.3: If yes, what was the main problem faced?
constraint: not((selected(., 'j3_14') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options (2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: J4_Livelihood
label::English: J.4: Does your household face problems accessing local markets?

name: J5_Livelihood
label::English: J.5: If yes, what problems?
constraint: not((selected(., 'j5_11') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options (2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: J6_Livelihood
label::English: J.6: In the past 30 days, did anyone in your household have to engage in any coping strategies* in order to meet the needs of the household?

name: J7_Livelihood
label::English: J.7: If yes, which coping strategies did your household have to engage in?
constraint: not((selected(., 'j7_15') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'j7_16') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: Dont Know or Don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: J8_Livelihood
label::English: J.8: Does the household currently owe debt to any creditors?

name: J9_Livelihood
label::English: J.9: If yes, what type of debt does the household owes?

name: J9a_Livelihood
label::English: J.9a: First top debt does the household owes?

name: J9b_Livelihood
label::English: J.9a: Second top debt does the household owes?
constraint: (${J9a_Livelihood} != ${J9b_Livelihood})
constraint_message: Second need must be different than the first one

name: J9c_Livelihood
label::English: J.9a: Third top debt does the household owes?
constraint: (${J9a_Livelihood} != ${J9c_Livelihood}) and (${J9b_Livelihood} != ${J9c_Livelihood})
constraint_message: Third need must be different than the first and second

name: J10_Livelihood
label::English: J.10: What is the most important need for the improvement of the livelihoods of your household?

name: SecKCash
label::English: K. Cash

name: K1_Cash
label::English: K.1: In the past 30 days, has your household received humanitarian assistance in the form of cash?  (if no, I don?t know, or I don?t want to answer, skip to section L)

name: K2_Cash
label::English: K.2: If yes, which organisation(s) has your household received cash assistance from?
constraint: not((selected(., 'k2_4') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'k2_5') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) >= 1
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: K3_Cash
label::English: K.3: How many times has your household received cash assistance in the past 30 days?

name: K4_Cash
label::English: K.4: In what form was the cash assistance delivered to your household?
constraint: not((selected(., 'k4_4') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'k4_5') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) >= 1
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: SecLHummAssist
label::English: L. Humanitarian Assistance

name: L1_HummAssist
label::English: L.1: Has your household received any type of humanitarian assistance in the last 30 days?

name: L2_HummAssist
label::English: L.2: If yes, what type of humanitarian assistance has been received to your household in the last 30 days? For each option, please consider both in-kind and cash assistance such as money or vouchers
constraint: not((selected(., 'l2_18') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'l2_19') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: L3_HummAssist
label::English: L.3: If yes, who provided the assistance delivered in the past 30 days?
constraint: not((selected(., 'l3_9') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'l3_10') and count-selected(.) >=2))
constraint_message: Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options

name: L4_HummAssist
label::English: L.4: How satisfied was your household with the assistance received?

name: L5_HummAssist
label::English: L.5: If partially or not satisfied, what were the reasons?
constraint: not((selected(., 'l5_12') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'l5_13') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: L6_HummAssist
label::English: L.6: How satisfied was your household with the way humanitarian actors behaved while providing assistance?

name: L7_HummAssist
label::English: L.7: Has any member of your household been asked to pay or give something in exchange for humanitarian assistance?

name: L8_HummAssist
label::English: L.8: In the case that your household did not receive any assistance, please specify the reasons?

name: L9_HummAssist
label::English: L.9: Would your household prefer to have more information from humanitarian agencies about humanitarian assistance?

name: L10_HummAssist
label::English: L.10: What type of information would your household like to receive from humanitarian agencies?
constraint: count-selected(.) <= 5
constraint_message: You can only select 5 options at the maximum

name: L10_HummAssist_other
label::English: L.10a: Please, enter the other type of information

name: L11_HummAssist
label::English: L.11: How would your household prefer to receive this information?
constraint: not((selected(., 'l11_8') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'l11_9') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 5
constraint_message: (1)Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 5 options at the maximum

name: L12_HummAssist
label::English: L.12: What is your household preferred means of receiving the information about humanitarian assistance?

name: L13_HummAssist
label::English: L.13: In the last 30 days, has your household been asked about what type of humanitarian assistance they would like to receive?

name: L14_HummAssist
label::English: L.14: If yes, did your household receive what they asked for?

name: L15_HummAssist
label::English: L.15: Does your household know how to present feedback or complaints to the humanitarian actors that delivered assistance?

name: L16_HummAssist
label::English: L.16: How would your household prefer to provide feedback to humanitarian actors about the quality, quantity, and appropriateness of assistance?
constraint: not((selected(., 'l16_14') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and not((selected(., 'l16_15') and count-selected(.) >=2)) and count-selected(.) <= 3
constraint_message: (1)Dont Know or don?t want to answer can not be selected with other options(2) you can only select 3 options at the maximum

name: FormName
label::English: Name this form
